meanings.definition: A small, edible nut from a type of hickory tree.
meanings.sent1: I found a pignut under the hickory tree.
meanings.sent2: Squirrels enjoy burying pignuts for later.
meanings.sent3: The pignut rolled away from the squirrel, playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: The pignut was a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of roasted pignuts filled the forest.

meanings.definition: A plant of the carrot family with an edible tuber.
meanings.sent1: The pignut plant has delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvest pignut tubers for their sweet taste.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to plant a pignut in the carrot patch.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a freshly dug pignut.
meanings.sent5: The pignut tuber resembled a tiny potato in shape.
